Package inputs

Class InputChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • inputs.InputChecker
  • public class InputChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checking the input that given by the user in the screens. Most of the functions are boolean. returns true or false based on the user input.

      • checkPaymentInput

        public static boolean checkPaymentInput​(java.lang.String firstName,
                                        java.lang.String lastName,
                                        java.lang.String cardNumber,
                                        java.lang.String month,
                                        java.lang.String year,
                                        java.lang.String vcc,
                                        java.lang.String id)
        Checking if the payment input is valid based on the parameters that given to the method. It's checks if the cardNumber, month, year and id contains only numbers with a relevant length. And it's checks if the first and last name contains only letters and spaces.
        Parameters:
        firstName -
        lastName -
        cardNumber -
        month -
        year -
        vcc -
        id -
        Returns:
        true or false based on the parameters.
